column1: short and wide, he tries to cut but misses, not a lot of carry or pace first up
good length, fourth stump line, 130kph, he chops this off the back foot to cover-point
back of a length, he heaves a front foot pull to deep square for a single
full and angled across and swinging wider, he tries to drive but misses, could have been a wide but not called
beaten by a back of a length ball that zips across him and swings after passing the bat
big swing and miss trying to launch over the off side, again there is some swing across and away from the right hander
drifting in, tries to give room and drives to mid off
slower and drifting down, he sweeps up and over short fine, gets a top edge but it flies far enough to carry the fielder
backs away and slices this up and over point, doesn't nail it but gets enough of it
arm ball, swinging in, he sweeps straight to short fine on the circle and they take one
short and wide and cut hard past point! Great shot, poor delivery, Klinger pounced and smashed it behind point
fuller outswinger, he drives firmly to mid off and goes with the stroke
back of a length on middle, he's back and tucking behind square nicely
fuller on off, he drives inside out to cover
bowled him! He tried to ramp, missed and it hits leg stump! He stepped across to a length ball trying to ramp it up and over short fine leg, beats him for pace and cannons into the top of leg stump
good length, nips in, caught on the crease, chops an inside edge to short fine and Klinger calls him through for one
magnificent off drive straight of wide mid off! Overpitched and a classical drive through the line. Beautiful stroke
good length, fourth stump line, he defends to cover
good length, nipping away, he pushes at it and gets a thick edge that runs to third man along the ground
good length wide of off, he pushes on the front foot to cover-point
sliced inside out over cover-point, one bounce over the rope! A little shuffle down the track and leg side to give room and he whipped his hands to go inside out. Good shot
good length, leg stump line, he tucks it to square leg
back of a length, he defends off the back foot back to the bowler
cracked over cover! Good length outside off and he feasts on the width throwing the hands through the line and nails it flat over cover
full and straight, he clips this beautifully wide of midwicket, the sweeper at deep square has to come around
beats the inside edge just goes past off stump! It nipped in off a length and kept a touch low as well
slower ball, outside off, he drives hard back to the bowler
shorter length, he's back and tucking this into the gap at square leg
good length, he stays still and flat bats this over mid on! Lovely flow of the bat and he smashes this down the ground!
good length on off, he pushes off the front foot, slowly to point on the circle and they run one easily
slower ball, top of off, he defends with soft hands to the gap at gully
edged through third man! This bounced a bit from back of a length, he got a genuine edge that flies through the vacant slips and down to an unprotected third man rope!
slower ball outswinger, he tries to drive and misses. Beautifully bowled
slower ball, off spinner, good length on off, he tucks it behind square for one

caught at deep point! Short and wide but it got a bit higher than expected, he nails the cut shot but hits it in the air all the way to the rope and the man is there, Wildermuth takes the easy catch! Trap set, and it worked.
good length, off stump, he defends off the back foot into the off side
leg break, tossed up on off, he drives to long off
slider into leg stump, he glances this to short fine
shorter leg break, skids on straight, he's back and chopping it down onto the pitch
wider leg break, 82kph, he square drives to deep cover-point
shorter leg break, he gives room and punches back to the bowler
drifting into leg stump, he drives on the front foot to long on
good length, off stump, he knocks this to cover-point and they pinch one
shorter length outside off, he pushes with an open face to backward point
shorter outside off, he chops a late cut to short third man for an easy one
caught at midwicket! Length ball, he tries to heave over deep midwicket, hits it straight up in the air, Sutherland at midwicket camps underneath and takes a comfortable catch!
back of a length, he punches off the back foot to cover
fuller length outside off, he drives on the up to cover
short and wide, he late cuts nicely down to third man
dropped! Caught and bowled chance! Good length angled in, he tries to work to leg, gets a leading edge back to the bowler and he drops in his follow through. Maybe did him for lack of pace
slices a drive in the air out towards deep cover but it doesn't land anywhere near the fielder
back of a length outside off, he cuts to backward point
very full outside off, he drives down to long off
short and wide, he late cuts down to third man
leg break, into leg stump, he is back and tucking it to square leg
tossed up on middle, he drives down to long on
slower leg break outside leg, 77kph, it hits the pad and rolls into the off side, there's a shout but it was going down
tossed up he lofts a drive beautifully straight at the sightscreen, between the sweepers for a couple
leg break on off, he drives to cover
flatter outside off, he advances and mistimes a drive to cover
bowled him! Full and slanting into the top of off, Klinger heaves across the line, it just slides through the gate, and crashes into the top of off! Well bowled
good length on off, he defends on the front foot back to the bowler
back of a length on middle, he defends this square of midwicket
good length outside off, he forces from the crease to cover
shorter length outside off, he punches off the back foot to long on
fuller outside off, he leans into a drive to mid off who is on the circle
full outside off, he drives straight to cover
slower and shorter, he's back and forcing back to the bowler
looped up outside off, he drives flowingly down to long off
tries to slog sweep, gets it off the cue end of the bat and it rolls to mid off
tossed up, he drives to cover, and White makes a good stop
wider and a fraction short, he late cuts past short third man, and they get a couple

huge top edge that might have hit the roof! It went straight up off the top edge and landed just behind the square leg umpire as three players converged but none could get there. It did hit the roof and is called six!
caught at midwicket! Back of a length, on middle, he tries to launch and miscues to White on the circle at midwicket and holes out. Simple catch
short and wide, he cuts hard through point to the sweeper
full and angled into off, he drives to mid on, there's some confusion but he's sent back
angled in, it comes off the thigh guard and runs slowly to short fine leg

caught at midwicket! Full and straight, he whips this beautifully but chest high straight to Cooper who is close and midwicket and he takes a simple catch! The Scorchers are in massive trouble at the moment
full and driven hard straight back to the bowler
length on off, no room offered, punched off the backfoot to cover
slower leg break, he tries to whip against the turn and gets a leading edge that flies to short third man
leg break on off, he drives to cover
shorter on off, he sits back and punches back to the bowler
shorter length, he's back and knocking this to midwicket
shorter outside off, but not much width, he gets a bottom edge cutting, that runs to the keeper
134kph, angled down the leg side and he doesn't glance it, clear wide
again, 129kph, angled way down the leg side
angled into leg stump, he glances nicely down to fine leg
short and wide and cracked through point! That was hit so hard and the cover sweeper had no chance! First boundary since the Powerplay
128kph, back of a length, he cuts to backward point on the circle
135kph, good length, he pushes on the front foot to cover
pulled hard through midwicket! This was fractionally short and he rocks back and smashes this forward of the square and the deep square sweeper had no chance
128kph, good length on off, he chops off the inside edge into pad and it rolls away
fuller length outside off, he drives nicely to long off
good length, he square drives inside out to deep cover-point
bowled him! Another ball angled into off stump, he tries to loft over midwicket, it zipped through the gate and cannons into off strump!
back of a length on off, he defends off the back foot to cover
129kph, nipping into the pad, it runs wide of off to third man. No appeal as it was missing leg
good length, he lofts this high over mid off, Cooper runs back but can't quite get to the drop
short and wide and he misses out on a late cut trying to run it to third man
top edge over the keeper! It just lands inside the rope! It was a good bumper, he hooked but got a thick top edge and it flew miles over the keeper's head
caught behind! Slower ball leg cutter outside off, he tried to late cut down to third man, he feathers a nick through to Ludeman and it's a simple catch
132kph, good length outside off, he tries to run to third man, it zips through and beats the bat
130kph, fuller length, he drives straight to cover
back of a length outside off, he gives room and punches to mid off
crunched over midwicket! Full and straight, he clears the left leg and hammers this hard and flat through midwicket and it races to the rope

leading edge caught at point! He charges and Shiwari sees it, he delivers a length slower ball, he tries to work to leg, closes the face, gets a leading edge that pops up to White on the circle at point. Simple catch
136kph, full, almost yorker length, he jams this out to cover
full outside off, he squeezes this out to point and they pinch one
134kph, good length, he pushes to cover on the circle
back of a length, 135kph, wider, he cuts nicely straight to point
good length, tighter to off, he tries to run to third man but misses
short ball outside off, 131kph, he tries to pull from wide of off and misses
back of a length, pulled to midwicket but can't beat the man
113kph slower ball, he drags a drive through forward square to the man in the deep
caught at long on! Slower ball, good length, he tries to swing through the line, he mistimes this and hits it straight down Christian's throat at long on and he takes the catch 25m in from the rope
LBW appeal, not out is the call. This was swinging back late, hit below the knee roll but swinging down leg
137kph, shorter and wider, this climbs off a length, he tries to cut but misses
drives on the up to mid off and Agar misfields poorly, to allow a second run
caught behind! Short lifter outside off, this climbs higher, it wasn't that wide, he tries to upper cut and gets a thin edge through to Whiteman! Perfect start for the Scorchers
good length, off stump line, he defends on the walk back to the bowler
slices a drive in the air just past backward point! It was flying and in the vicinity of Cartwright but just out of reach and it raced away
132kph, good length outswinger, he defends from the crease to point
chopped on! Just short of a length outside off, he tries to pull but it wasn't short enough, it comes off the bottom edge onto the stumps! What a start for the Scorchers!
wide of the crease, sprayed way down the leg side
shorter length, 139kph, on middle, he's back and across and knocking this forward of square for one
low full toss targeting off stump, he works this wide of mid on
135kph, good length outswinger that zips away, it squares him up completely and beats the bat
135kph, short into the ribs, he is back and knocking this down behind square
LBW appeal! Not out. He didn't offer a shot! It just touched the pad and went over the stumps.
133kph, back of a length, he drives on the up to cover
fuller inswinger, he drives to mid off
bowled him! Wow! 130kph, inswinger, full and shaping back late, it hoops through the huge gate left by White as he tries to drive through cover! The Renegades are in horrible trouble!
good length across the right hander, he square drives on the up running this fine of backward point and wide of third man
133kph, back of a length, he punches on the back foot to cover-point
138kph, good length outswinger, huge swing and miss trying to launch over mid off
135kph, good length angled into off, he defends from the crease
LBW shout, not out. Outside the line trying to ramp from outside off! This was full and angling into off but it was outside the line as it took the pad. What a strange shot
hooked in the air, it hangs up for a long time but it is fine of deep square and rolls into the rope!

caught at backward point! Another one! Leading edge! Good length off stump line, he closes the face trying to turn it to the leg side, gets a leading edge and it floats to Cartwright at backward point. Simple catch. This is carnage!
beaten wafting the bat outside off! It was a good length wide of off, he went to play and tried to leave late but was beaten for pace!
shorter length, he walks and pulls on the walk through square leg to the sweeper in the deep
133kph, good length on off, he defends from the crease to mid off
132kph, short into the hip, it comes off the thigh guard and drops down on the off side and the Scorchers are in saving one
133kph, good length, nips away and beats the edge outside off
beaten again, 131kph, good length, going across off the seam with the angle

top edge just flies over slip! He walked at him, it was banged in, he tried to heave a cross bat shot over the leg side, gets a thick top edge and it flies over slip, Coulter-Nile runs back but can't get there. Crazy stuff
130kph, short into the hip, it runs off thigh guard behind square
good length outside off, he defends to backward point, they look for one, but Cartwright is hunting a run out

almost caught at deep square by Behrendorff! This was pulled in the air to deep square, Behrendorff runs around and almost pulls off a spectacular catch, but he traps it and saves four. Brilliant fielding
good length, outside off, he defends into the off side
steps outside off and ramps it over the keeper's head! Unbelievable shot! He set up early, ramped the length ball up and over Whiteman
launched over deep square! Length ball and he swung so hard to send this way over square leg! It almost hit the roof and it carried over the rope with the man right back on the rope! Amazing shot
slower ball, back of a length, he tries to pull, bottom edge onto pad rolls through to the keeper
good length, off stump, he defends from the crease to midwicket
cut hard wide of third man! Short and wide and he cuts in the air but places it past backward point and it races to the rope
beaten by a good length, nipping across, he just defended at it from the crease
lofted over cover! Incredible strike. He takes a couple of steps down and outside leg and lofts inside out over cover and it carries all the way. Special shot that from Nabi
130kph, good length, defended to cover

wrong un dragged short down leg, he steps back and pulls fine of short fine, they push hard and race back for three! The throw was good but Nabi got home. it was checked by the TV umpire. It's taking awhile. He's easily safe
83kph, looped up leg break, he drives down to long on
short down leg, a drag down, he hammers a pull shot fine of deep square! Bad ball and it was punished
tossed up, he drives down the ground to long on
drifting into leg, he slips this away to deep square
short long hop, pulled into the stands over fine leg! That ball stuck in the hand and it disappeared into the stands!
full into leg stump and he clips this beautifully off his toes behind square into the gap!
short ball, 118kph, slower ball, he pulls through square leg along the ground
110kph, slower ball, he drives hard to long on
128kph, bouncer, he tries to hook but is beaten for pace and bounce
126kph, full into leg stump, he clipped this away through square leg to the man in the deep
132kph, good length into off stump, he defends with the angle to midwicket
pulled off the top edge over fine leg! It was short on the hip, he rolled the wrists on a pull shot and it flew off the top edge and carried way over the fine leg rope
lofts him down the ground at the sightscreen! Fuller length, he stands still and launches through the line, it just pitched short of the rope
full toss, leg stump, glanced fine to the man at long leg
129kph, good length into off stump, he defends from the back foot to midwicket
130kph, back of a length, he sits back and works this off his hip to midwicket
114kph, short slower ball outside off, he cuts nicely to deep point
good length, off stump, he defends on the front foot close into the off side
130kph, beaten by a back of a length ball as he tries to run to third man. there was a noise but no appeal. Whiteman thought he heard something.
good length, nipping away, he is beaten again trying to run to third man
128kph, shorter length, he sits back and pulls hard along the ground to deep square
carves a square drive in the air out to deep cover-point but it falls well short of the man on the rope
slower ball, width, he slices a cut, gets a thick edge and it just flies over short third man!
drifting down leg, it runs off pad and runs fine to short third man
holed out to long on! He cleared the front leg and tried to slog this over wide long on into the stands, mistimes it and it goes straight down the throat of Tye at long on.
tossed up on middle, he drives back to the bowler
darted into leg stump, he drives down to long on

run out! Direct hit from Klinger after a mix up! He drives towards long off, Agar dives left and gets a hand on it, Harper calls yes and runs more than halfway down but Christian went back to his crease and sent Harper back, Klinger comes across from cover, gathers fires at the striker's end and a direct hit catches Harper a foot short as he dives back
92kph, he drives on the up backward of point and forces the sweeper to come around to field
full into off, he chops off the inside edge down to long leg
127kph, short ball, lifted, he rises on his toes and knocks this down onto the pitch
128kph, lifted outside off, he rides the bounce and defends to backward point
shorter outside off, he cuts this down to third man
127kph, good length on off, he defends on the front foot back to the bowler
133kph, good length on off, he defends on the front foot to point
86kph, shorter and wider, he's back and cutting hard to deep point
tossed up on off, he pushes on the front foot out through cover-point
fired down the leg side, he misses trying to glance
shorter and wider, he cuts to deep point
flatter and quicker, he defends on the front foot, back to the bowler
tossed up, he drives on the front foot, out to deep cover-point
tossed up and he drives up and over cover, into the outfield, deep point comes around
wrong un, shorter, spins down leg
wrong un outside off, he backs away and late cuts, Turner slips at short third man and misfields to allow a couple
leg break on off, he defends on the front foot
full toss, driven hard straight to cover
wrong un, well landed, he stretches out and defends on the front foot
looped up on leg, he defends back to the bowler on the front foot
quicker and flatter, he's back and working this through square leg
109kph, good length outside off, he defends into the off side
launched over long on! What a way to win it! Full and straight and he lofts this high over long on and it carries the rope
